net.sourceforge.jwbf.bots
Class MediaWikiBot

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jwbf.bots.HttpBot
      net.sourceforge.jwbf.bots.MediaWikiBot

public class MediaWikiBot
extends HttpBot

This class helps you to interact with each mediawiki. How to use: 

 MediaWikiBot b = new MediaWikiBot("http://yourwiki.org");
 b.login("Username", "Password");
 System.out.writeln(b.readContentOf("Main Page").getText());

Author:
Thomas Stock
